widget.name: Sonax Connector
widget.short_description: Connect Sonax Virtual PBX to Kommo and make click-to-call calls with recording and logging directly on the platform.
widget.description: The Sonax Connector integrates Sonax Virtual PBX with Kommo, allowing you to make calls to leads and contacts directly through the platform using the click-to-call feature.
widget.tour_description:
Click-to-Call: Start calls to leads or contacts with just one click, directly from Kommo, without needing to switch between platforms.

Call History: Track the full history of calls, including date, duration, and recording, and listen to conversations without leaving Kommo.
